HiddenText.Name: Where can I find payroll notification information?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Where can I find payroll notification information?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Paystubs are available through a third party system from Deseret Mutual Benefit Administrators (DMBA). To access their paystubs instructors will need to login into www.dmba.com with their DMBA identification number and password. (If you do not know your DMBA ID number and/or password call, 1-800-777-3622.) After logging in, select "My Benefits" on the left hand side of the screen and then "Paycheck Stub" from the drop down menu.
